property.name: clientId
property.description-key: The Client ID for your ArcGIS OAuth application. Required for authentication.

property.name: portalUrl
property.description-key: The URL of your ArcGIS Online portal. Default is https://www.arcgis.com.

property.name: webMapId
property.description-key: The ID of the WebMap you want to display from ArcGIS Online.

property.name: lookupLayerId
property.description-key: The ID of the layer in the WebMap where lookup operations will occur. Optional.

property.name: lookupFieldName
property.description-key: The field name in the lookup layer to filter features. Optional.

property.name: lookupFieldValue
property.description-key: The value in the lookup field to filter features. Optional.

property.name: logoUrl
property.description-key: The URL of a logo to display on the map. Optional.
